DESCRIPTION: The next single target Attack you play is played on ALL enemies.
#yConductive creatures take damage when attacked. Whenever this triggers, #yConductive is reduced by #b1.
When a creature's #yToxin is not less than its HP, it dies and ALL of its allies take damage.
The next time this creature is attacked #b3 times in the same turn, it takes damage equal to #b10 times its #yResonance.
Whenever you play another card this turn, play a copy of this card. Cards played this way do not trigger #yMind-Meld.

#yBurned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. #yBurn is reduced by #b1 each turn and increased by #b1 whenever a card is #yExhausted.
Look at random cards in your draw pile. You may add one of them to your #yStash. #yStashed cards are added to your hand next turn.
